text:
League 1
ASSE - Monaco: Bakayoko package!
Tiemou√© Bakayoko will not be present against AS Saint-Etienne in the closing match of this 12 th day of Ligue 1 between ASSE and Monaco.
02 Nov 2019, 21:40 by Hugo Deloraine



It is a perilous move that will perform AS Monaco in St Etienne, this Sunday at 21 hours, the closing of this 12 th day of Ligue 1. To make this meeting, the Monegasques will have to do without their midfielder recovery Ti√©mou√© Bakayoko, touched on the left ankle, already spared Marseille in the Coupe de la Ligue.




The Monegasque group




Wissam Ben Yedder + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Monaco will also have to call without Islam Slimani and Cesc Fabregas, both injured. However, they can rely on the top scorer in the championship, Wissam Ben Yedder.
